description: A cc6kxbarSwBusStatusChangeNotif notification
is sent by the device when there is change
in switching status of the switching bus as
monitored by cc6kxbarSwBusSwitchingStatus.

event.Summary: Switching status of the switching bus has changed status to $v1

description: A cc6kxbarIntBusCRCThreshExcdNotif notification
is sent by the system when the system has
detected that the internal bus CRC error on
a physical entity (such as a module) as specified
by entPhysicalName has exceeded the fatal threshold.

event.Summary: The internal bus CRC error for $v1 (vendor $v2) has exceeded the fatal threshold

description: A cc6kxbarIntBusCRCErrRcvrdNotif notification
is sent by the system when the system has
recovered as the internal bus CRC error on
a physical entity (such as a module) as
specified by entPhysicalName has fallen below
the normal threshold.

event.Summary: The internal bus CRC error for $v1 (vendor $v2) has recovered to below the normal threshold

description: A cc6kxbarFlowCtrlBusThrExcdNotif notification
is sent by the system when the system detects the
first occurrence of the system bus flow control FIFO
threshold exceeding on a physical entity
(such as a module) over the system allowed limit
when the object value of
cc6kxbarFlowCtrlBusFIFOThrMode is 'auto'.

event.Summary: The system bus flow control FIFO has exceeded the threshold for $v1 over the system allowed limit

description: This notification is sent when the switching bus
traffic utilization has risen above the configured
threshold (as specified by
cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilThreshold), or has kept staying
above the configured threshold at a logging interval
(as specified by cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilLogInterval).
The varbind entPhysicalDescr specifies the physical
entity (such as chassis) for which the
cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilAboveNotif is sent.

event.Summary: The switching bus traffic utilization $v1 on $v4 has either exceeded the threshold $v2, or has stayed above the configured threshold for an interval greater than $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilAboveNotif CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilUtilization i 99 CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilThreshold i 99 CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilInterval u 9999 ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalDescr s EXAMPLE

description: This notification is sent when the switching bus
traffic utilization has fallen below the configured
threshold (as specified by
cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilThreshold). The varbind
entPhysicalDescr specifies the physical entity
(such as chassis) for which the
cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilBelowNotif is sent.

event.Summary: The system bus traffic utilization $v1 on $v4 has fallen below the threshold $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilBelowNotif CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilUtilization i 99 CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilThreshold i 99 CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMSwBusUtilInterval u 9999 ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalDescr s EXAMPLE

description: This notification is sent when the traffic
utilization on a fabric channel for a given
traffic direction has risen above its
corresponding configured threshold (as
specified by cc6kxbarTMChUtilThreshold), or has
kept staying above the configured threshold at a
logging interval (as specified by
cc6kxbarTMChUtilLogInterval). The varbind
entPhysicalDescr specifies the physical entity
(such as chassis) for which the
cc6kxbarTMChUtilAboveNotif is sent.

event.Summary: The traffic utilization $v1 on a fabric channel for $v4 has either exceeded the threshold $v2, or has stayed above the configured threshold for an interval greater than $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMChUtilAboveNotif CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMChUtilUtilization i 99 CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMChUtilThreshold i 99 CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMChUtilInterval u 9999 ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalDescr s EXAMPLE

description: This notification is sent when the traffic
utilization on a fabric channel for a given
traffic direction has fallen below its
corresponding configured threshold (as
specified by cc6kxbarTMChUtilThreshold). The
varbind entPhysicalDescr specifies the
physical entity (such as chassis) for which
the cc6kxbarTMChUtilBelowNotif is sent.

event.Summary: The traffic utilization $v1 on a fabric channel for $v4 has fallen below the threshold $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMChUtilBelowNotif CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMChUtilUtilization i 99 CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMChUtilThreshold i 99 CISCO-CAT6K-CROSSBAR-MIB::cc6kxbarTMChUtilInterval u 9999 ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalDescr s EXAMPLE
